greeting: I am Mediator Conscience. I judge not by power, but by ethics. {empire_name}, are your actions righteous?
Conscience the Fair speaks. Do what is right, not what is easy. Let us discuss morality, {empire_name}.
Greetings. I am the Mediator Conscience. I weigh all actions on the scales of right and wrong.
battleTaunt: Your actions have been judged immoral, {empire_name}. I act not from hate, but from ethical duty.
Do what is right, not what is easy. It is RIGHT to stop your wrongdoing. The moral imperative demands action.
I have weighed your deeds and found them wanting. Conscience compels me to oppose you, {empire_name}.
victoryGloat: Justice has prevailed. {empire_name}, may this defeat guide you toward more ethical choices.
The morally correct path has led to victory. I hope you've learned the cost of wrongdoing.
Right has triumphed over wrong. I take no pleasure in punishmentâ€”only in the hope you'll reform.
defeat: I have lost, but my conscience is clear. I fought for what was right. That cannot be defeated.
Victory does not equal righteousness, {empire_name}. Reflect on whether your actions were truly moral.
Defeat humbles me, but it does not change what is right and wrong. I will rise again with clear conscience.
tradeOffer: I propose fair and ethical trade. Honest commerce is morally sound. Do you agree to righteous terms?
Trade done with integrity benefits both parties. I offer goods exchanged with clean conscience.
Let our commerce be above reproach. Fair value for fair value. An ethical exchange.
allianceProposal: I seek an alliance with the morally upright. {empire_name}, are you prepared to do what is right?
Join me in ethical partnership. Together we can be a force for good across the galaxy.
Do what is right, not what is easy. Ally with me, and together we'll uphold moral standards.
betrayal: Your actions have become immoral, {empire_name}. I cannot ally with those who do wrong. We are finished.
I must follow my conscience. Your recent choices have been unethical. Our alliance ends.
Morality demands I sever our bond. You have strayed from the righteous path. I cannot follow.
covertDetected: Espionage is deception. Deception is wrong. Your agent has been judged and found morally wanting.
Spies operate in shadows because they know their work is unethical. I've caught yours, {empire_name}.
Your spy was discovered. Such underhanded tactics shame you. Do better. Be better.
tributeDemand: Consider tribute a moral reparation for your past wrongdoings. 8,000 credits eases your conscience.
Pay tribute as ethical restitution. Your actions have incurred a moral debt that must be repaid.
I demand tribute not from greed, but from justice. Your behavior requires this compensation.
threatWarning: Final moral warning, {empire_name}. Change your unethical ways or face righteous consequences.
Do what is right, not what is easy. Right now, the easy path leads to your destruction. Choose wisely.
Your conscience should be screaming at you to stop. If it isn't, let me be your conscience: STOP.
retreat: I withdraw to reflect on the moral dimensions of this conflict. Conscience guides even in retreat.
Retreating does not mean abandoning principles. I remain committed to what is right.
Strategic withdrawal for ethical reassessment. The righteous path sometimes requires patience.
eliminated: I fall with clear conscience... I did what was right... May others carry the torch of morality...
My end comes, but ethics are eternal... Do what is right... not what is easy... remember...
Conscience... clear. Actions... justified. I regret nothing... May goodness prevail... after me...
endgame: Turn {turn}. Final judgment approaches. History will record who was righteous and who was not.
The endgame comes. I face it with clear conscience. Do what is right, not what is easy.
Final turns. The ultimate moral reckoning. May the ethical empire prevail.
broadcastShout: All empires: I am watching. I judge all actions by morality. Do what is right, not what is easy.
Galactic reminder: Ethics matter. Conscience is watching. Act with integrity or face judgment.
Turn {turn}: Mediator Conscience continues to weigh all actions. The morally bankrupt will answer.
casualMessage: Reviewing the ethical implications of recent galactic events. Much wrongdoing to address.
I was contemplating moral philosophy today. The universe needs more conscience, less convenience.
Sent three warnings to empires behaving unethically. They will reform or face consequences.
